title: Jenkins security advisory (AV25-707)
description: On October 29, 2025, Jenkins published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Extensible Choice Parameter Plugin   239.v5f5c278708cf and prior
Start Windocks Containers Plugin  1.4 and prior
Nexus Task Runner Plugin  0.9.2 and prior
ByteGuard Build Actions Plugin  1.0 and prior
Publish to Bitbucket Plugin  version 0.4 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
